column4: Very good product and lot of features. Timely received with good packaging. Strongly recommend for purchase by Daraz."}
column8: \ncostly but has a lot of features
column9: \npacking was good and received in good condition.\nOn time delivery."}
column12: comment:"Received the package on time and the condition of the product is satisfactory. Great costumer service. Will shop again."}
column15: comment:"5 stars to Daraz for taking care of me as thier regular cutomer. this order was fulfilled by Daraz (FBD) and Daraz handled the product very well. i got the refrigerator in very good packing and shape. and was sent to me by TCS well in time. thanks Daraz. Daraz also compensated me by giving me a voucher. and also ensured that they will convey my undermentioned remarks and review to Dawlance who actually gave wrong info abt the product on thier official platform. i.e.
column16: misguiding size. really disappointing experience and poor customer support by Dawlance... the representative of Dawlance didn't admit the fault that dawlance official website showed the product as 17 cubic feet. i referred to website of dawlance as it is more authentic. Will definitely report it to Citizen portal and with Consumer court as well against Dawlance. once again 5 stars to Daraz for good customer care."}
